save() - Method in class org.klotski.controller.SaveFileController
Function to select where to store data.
SaveFileController - Class in org.klotski.controller
SaveFileController is a controller class that is used to change where to store current game log.
It dialogues with Window
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window

This constructor saved data from Window

saveGame(boolean) - Method in class org.klotski.controller.SaveGameController
Function to save the current game.
If delete is true, the current game will be deleted.
It is useful when someone wins the game and exits it.
It is preferable to call this function inline, for example:
SaveGameController - Class in org.klotski.controller
SaveGameController is a controller class that is used to save current game log.
It dialogues with Window and GameSaver
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window

This constructor saved data from Window

setSelectedUser(String) - Method in class org.klotski.coding.UsernameCollector
Selects the given user as The selected one.
If that user is not written in the file it writes it and adds it in the vector, in the first position.
It also changes the position of a user in the Vector and places it in the first position.
setText(String) - Method in class org.klotski.coding.GameSaver
